name: Plastic Fishing Lures

description: Durable plastic handles for fishing rods, providing grip and comfort.

description: Plastic boxes for organizing and storing fishing tackle and accessories.

description: Buoyant plastic floats used in fishing lines to keep bait at the desired depth.

description: Plastic boards for measuring the size of caught fish.
